Crypto traders Aug and Slumpt often joked that they’d launch a cryptocurrency around the mogging meme but never really pulled through. That was until Aug decided to press the button.

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
The success of a memecoin can be both explosive and transformative. Pepecoin (PEPE) has shown how a meme-based cryptocurrency can achieve remarkable returns, capturing the imagination of investors and the broader crypto community. Now, as the crypto market continues to evolve, a new contender has emerged: Mpeppe (MPEPE). Here’s why investors who have previously backed Pepecoin (PEPE) are turning their attention to Mpeppe (MPEPE) and what sets it apart in the crowded memecoin landscape.
 
The Legacy of Pepecoin (PEPE): A Proven Success 
Pepecoin (PEPE) has earned its place in the cryptocurrency hall of fame with its unique blend of internet culture and digital finance. Known for its viral appeal and community-driven success, Pepecoin (PEPE) has delivered impressive returns for its investors…
articles.title: Pepe Investors Believe This New Rival Memecoin Will Provide PEPE-Like Returns

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
Dogecoin (DOGE) whales, known for their strategic investments and keen market insights, are turning their attention to an exciting new ICO: Mpeppe (MPEPE). This shift highlights a growing trend among seasoned investors who are seeking new avenues to amplify their returns and diversify their portfolios.
 
Why Dogecoin (DOGE) Investors Are Exploring Mpeppe (MPEPE)
 
The emergence of Mpeppe (MPEPE) has sparked significant interest among Dogecoin (DOGE) investors. Unlike Dogecoin (DOGE), which has primarily built its reputation on meme culture, Mpeppe (MPEPE) blends sports passion with blockchain innovation. This unique combination offers a fresh perspective in the cryptocurrency landscape, attracting those eager to capitalize on the next big thing.
 
The Power of Sports Passion and Blockchain…
articles.title: Dogecoin Whales Aims To Double Their Wealth With Exciting New ICO Mpeppe

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
As the cryptocurrency landscape continuously shifts, investors are perpetually on the lookout for groundbreaking opportunities that promise significant returns. In the vibrant world of meme coins, Pepe Unchained (PEPU) has recently become a focal point due to its distinctive approach and technological advancements. However, a new contender, Mpeppe (MPEPE), is swiftly gaining attention as the next potential game-changer in the market, particularly among those who have already seen success with Pepe Unchained (PEPU).
 
Pepe Unchained (PEPU) – A New Standard in Meme Coins 
Pepe Unchained (PEPU) has managed to carve out a niche in the highly competitive meme coin market by doing more than just capitalizing on meme culture. What sets PEPU apart from its rivals is its development on an independe…
articles.title: Pepe Unchained Investors Flock Towards New Gambling Memecoin Mpeppe For Big Profits

As the cryptocurrency landscape continues to evolve, Shiba Inu (SHIB) investors are constantly on the lookout for new opportunities to maximize their returns. While Shiba Inu has been a dominant player in the meme coin market, a new rival, Mpeppe (MPEPE), is capturing the attention of savvy investors with its predicted 240x growth potential.
 
The Shiba Inu (SHIB) Journey: A Look Back 
Shiba Inu (SHIB) has been a staple in the meme coin market, known for its strong community and significant market presence. Despite recent challenges, including declining activity on its Layer-2 network, Shibarium, Shiba Inu (SHIB) remains a popular choice among investors. However, the recent downturn in user activity and market performance has led some SHIB holders to explore other options that promise high…
articles.title: Shiba Inu Investors Double SHIB Profits In PEPU Rival Predicted 240X Growth

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
In the ever-evolving world of cryptocurrencies, Ripple (XRP) has long been a favorite among institutional investors and whales. However, recent developments indicate that even the largest XRP holders are starting to diversify their portfolios by eyeing new, high-potential tokens like Mpeppe (MPEPE). With the crypto market constantly shifting, these whales are betting on Mpeppe to become one of the future giants of the industry.
 
Ripple (XRP) Whales: Masters of the Market 
Ripple (XRP) has consistently been a top contender in the cryptocurrency market, primarily due to its utility in cross-border payments and strong partnerships with financial institutions. XRP’s stability and widespread adoption have made it a favorite among institutional investors, often referred to as “whales” due to th…
articles.title: XRP Whales Set Their Eyes On Mpeppe As The Future Giants Of Crypto

articles.author: Frank Corva
articles.description:
₿trust, a non-profit focused on training and funding developers from The Global South for Bitcoin open-source development, recently announced Bitcoin Core contributor and one of its board members, Abubakar Nur Khalil, as Interim CEO.

1/ 📢 Exciting news from ₿trust!
We're thrilled to announce that Abubakar Nur Khalil (@ihate1999), Nigerian Bitcoin Core contributor and current board member, has been appointed as Interim CEO of ₿trust pic.twitter.com/km5iYQU6Pe
— Btrust (@btrustteam) August 8, 2024
  
  
  
The non-profit was founded in 2021 and received initial funding from Jay-Z and Jack Dorsey. It’s since nurtured an ever-expanding network of Bitcoin developers in Africa, Latin America and India.
₿trust has trained hundreds of developers including some who are working on projects such as…
articles.title: Jay-Z and Jack Dorsey-Backed Bitcoin Non-Profit ₿trust Appoints Bitcoin Core Contributor As Interim CEO

articles.author: Jamie Redman
articles.description: The latest figures from U.S. spot bitcoin and ethereum exchange-traded funds (ETFs) reveal another contrasting shift. Bitcoin ETFs welcomed $192.56 million in inflows, while their ethereum counterparts saw around $2.87 million in net outflows. Blackrock’s IBIT Leads Inflow Gains On Thursday, bitcoin and ether ETFs moved in opposite directions, with bitcoin funds posting gains and […]
articles.title: US Bitcoin ETFs Soar With $192M Boost; Ethereum ETFs Record Modest Loss

articles.author: Jake Simmons
articles.description:
The US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has signaled it will not appeal Wednesday’s ruling by Judge Torres in the legal battle with Ripple. The case concluded on August 7 with the company facing a civil penalty significantly less than the SEC originally demanded.
 
Judge Torres’s decision mandated a $125 million civil penalty for securities violations related to sales to institutions, along with a disgorgement of $0. This is a stark contrast to the approximately $2 billion in damages initially sought by the SEC. Additionally, an injunction was imposed to prevent further violations of Section 5 of the Securities Act.
 
SEC Breaks Silence On Ripple Ruling
 
While Ripple’s executives immediately commented on the ruling via X, celebrating the ruling as a victory, the US agency remained…
articles.title: Big News For Ripple: SEC Signals No Plans To Appeal Ruling

articles.title: Stablecoin Economy Swells by $1.53B in 3 Days Amid Market Rebound

articles.author: Christian Encila
articles.description:
Russian President Vladimir Putin has signed a law on Thursday, officially giving legal status for crypto mining in the country.
 
 
This historic law not only brings Russia into the global crypto economy but also sets in motion a legislative blueprint to prevent illegal activity, so ensuring the nation stays both a player and a watchdog in the digital financial scene.
 
New Regulations For Crypto Miners
 
According to multiple news outlets, the new legislation, set to go into effect this November, gives registered legal firms and individual entrepreneurs exclusive rights to mine cryptocurrencies in an attempt to balance innovation and control.
 
There is, however, a break for the small players: people who stay within certain government-set energy consumption limits can mine without having …
articles.title: Putin Legalizes Crypto Mining, Ushering In A New Era For Russia

articles.author: Ronaldo Marquez
articles.description:
The Supreme Court of Montenegro has postponed the extradition of Terraform Labs founder Do Kwon to his home country of South Korea, pending a review of the legality of the previous court decisions. 
 
This comes after the Supreme State Prosecutor’s Office (VDT) submitted a request to protect legality on August 2nd, proposing to delay the execution of the extradition orders issued by the High Court in Podgorica and the Court of Appeal.
 
Conflicting Rulings Plague Do Kwon Extradition Saga 
 
According to local media reports, the panel, headed by Judge Seka Piletić, made the ruling in response to a request from the VDT, which raised concerns about whether the court’s previous decisions approving Do Kwon’s extradition to South Korea and rejecting his extradition to the United States were lega…
articles.title: Montenegro’s Supreme Court Halts Do Kwon’s Homecoming To South Korea Again – Details

articles.title: Andrena Raises $18 Million to Develop Solana-Based Depin Broadband Protocol Dawn

articles.author: Rubmar Garcia
articles.description:
On Thursday, Indian crypto exchange WazirX announced its plan to compensate customers after the multi-million exploit it suffered last month. The exchange revealed it decided to restore the balances of all customers and undo all trades carried out before July 18 and July 21.
 
 
WazirX To Restore All Account Balances
 
On July 18, WazirX fell victim to a security breach that took approximately $235 million from one of the trading platforms’ multisig wallets. The crypto heist stole millions of ETH, SHIB, PEPE, MATIC, and other tokens, leaving thousands of users empty-handed.
 
As a result, the platform halted operations and set into motion a plan to recover the stolen funds. The bounty program designated 10% of the stolen funds, around $23 million, to those who assisted WazirX’s team in rec…
articles.title: Crypto Exchange WazirX To Restore User Balances Following $230 Million Hack
